issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
my Appcelerator Studio crashed so i deleted all of it. hope so, i got all
then installed new. but get this error:

SyntaxError: Unexpected end of JSON input
    at Object.parse (native)
    at Object.readConfig (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/appcelerator/lib/util.js:720:30)
    at Object.<anonymous> (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/appcelerator/bin/appc:96:23)
    at Module._compile (module.js:570:32)
    at Object.Module._extensions..js (module.js:579:10)
    at Module.load (module.js:487:32)
    at tryModuleLoad (module.js:446:12)
    at Function.Module._load (module.js:438:3)
    at Module.runMain (module.js:604:10)
    at run (bootstrap_node.js:394:7)

what to do

comments.body:
After deinstalling Appcelerator and node etc and reinstalling of all components, the system seems to work ok again.

can somebody explain me, why this system collapsed within a minute after just opening a project, updating it from SVN and try to run it in the IOS simulator, without installing any new components
Hello, Your previous installation was somehow unsuccessful. Thanks for letting us know the issue is fixed.
